code: import{createSelector}from"reselect";var selectShop=function selectShop(state){return state.shop;};export var selectShopCollections=createSelector([selectShop],function(shop){return shop.collections;});export var selectShopCollectionsForPreview=createSelector([selectShopCollections],function(collections){return collections?Object.keys(collections).map(function(key){return collections[key];}):[];});export var selectCollection=function selectCollection(collectionUrlParam){return createSelector([selectShopCollections],function(collections){return collections?collections[collectionUrlParam]:null;});};export var selectIsFetching=createSelector([selectShop],function(shop){return shop.isFetching;});export var selectIsCollectionsLoaded=createSelector([selectShop],function(shop){return!!shop.collections;});
